title: Ballerina
brief_description: A film portrait of Margaret Mercier, graduate of Sadler’s Wells Ballet, prima ballerina of Les Grands Ballets Canadiens, Montreal and a student of the Bolshoi Ballet. She tells her own story in this film - how she feels about the demands of her art, the dedication, energy, work and persistence that it requires.
